TopicTitle: KSP running very poorly and nothing seems to change it

Articles.Content:
I haven't played in a good 3-4 months and when I loaded up the game I saw that it was running insanely slow. Stuttering on the main menu and a slideshow during launches. Strangely enough the VAB doesn't seem to have much lag. I tried lowering the graphics, no noticeable change. I updated my drivers, no change, I made sure ksp was using my graphics card, no change. Its not like my laptop is slow and I really don't understand what's causing the crippling lag.

Laptop specs just in case:

Intel i7-9750H

32GB RAM

Nividia GTX 1650

1TB SSD

Send logs please:

If you got KSP via Steam, verify the game files as you might have some corrupted files that are causing errors or exceptions in flight. It might also help to record a video of the problem.
